title: Is Xerath unviable vs tanky teams?
body: He does like no damage? Even Ziggs does more and he has only a 47% winrate past 40 minutes. How do I win games as Xerath if they have a bunch of tanks hard engaging? What mages of his style are good vs that?

replies.body: He can try to bypass tanks to hit the carry with hos Q and ult and use his other two skills for peel, but you have to position very well.

Xerath is trash against anyone who can get on him which are mostly tanks and divers i played against the rank 2 challenger and he was completely useless late game because our tank had rightous glory(whatever its called) and he couldnt do anything
Idk, if you have {{item:3151}} + {{item:3135}} he can be quite viable against tankier comps imo
